The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

Hi @100pah  Is there any update on this issue? 
It is essential in most enterprise applications to allow users to switch between log scale and linear scale, and zero/negative values should be treated as empty in those cases.
没人回答了吗

都三年了！！
还不支持 tooltip

The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

@100p @pavish It might not be ideal, but I've switch the data to `null` when the value is zero/negative and switch it back to its original value when using the linear scale.

> @100p @pavish It might not be ideal, but I've switch the data to `null` when the value is zero/negative and switch it back to its original value when using the linear scale.

@jonavila I guess I can use that for now, until the issue is fixed. Thanks!
Hey, yes, it will be great if this feature is implemented! Maybe, are there some workarounds on this issue for now, that don't have annoying spaces?

https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xJMT3esNuS&v=1
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6037522/63140669-44a4ad80-c015-11e9-908a-65110375dbcb.png)

tooltip.renderMode: 'richText'
可以避免此问题（can solve this problem）
try tooltip.extraCssText: 'transform: translateZ(999px);'
try tooltip.extraCssText: 'transform: translateZ(999px);'

> tooltip.renderMode: 'richText'
> 可以避免此问题（can solve this problem）

亲测可行 多谢

您说的两个js文件我都已经引入了，这个问题和网络状态有关系吗？我刷新十几次，里面就会有一次两次能显示出来，没有任何错误。这种有时行有时不行的情况是为什么？



发自我的iPhone


------------------ 原始邮件 ------------------
发件人: Fawen <notifications@github.com>
发送时间: 2019年8月13日 14:52
收件人: apache/incubator-echarts <incubator-echarts@noreply.github.com>
抄送: weizihahaha <sas_0@qq.com>, Author <author@noreply.github.com>
主题: 回复：[apache/incubator-echarts] 网页引用echart地图时无法显示 (#10999)




这个错误就是所需的地图数据没有引入的时候提示的，官网上下载的地图数据就是map文件夹中的文件，肯定是你没有正确引入，你可以先试试在 codepen 或者 codesandbox 上排除其他因素，引入 echarts 和china.js尝试一下，应该就可以的
 
—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

没有发现该问题，可以截图看下么，估计是浏览器渲染的问题
setOption 的第二个参数设置为 true，不会用合并的方式设置 option

已在问题中给出前后对比截图，浏览器是chrome

> 没有发现该问题，可以截图看下么，估计是浏览器渲染的问题

It's the difference between entry animation and transition animation.

+ The first one is entry animation, it is used when series is first created.

+ The second one is transition animation, it is used when series already exists but the data is changed. 

I suggest you only set series when data is ready.
我这也可复现了，我们看下，谢谢反馈

Every time you setOption, the graph will start running force directed layout again. But the behavior should be more like other nodes and only move slightly. The crazy ones are not expected. 

Can you give me a more detailed option with data. So I can use it to reproduce it and try if it can be fixed by tuning the layout parameters.

Also we should support the label visibility callback when graph is zoomed later so you don't need to setOption every time. But it will take some time.
应该是个 bug，@deqingli 截图的这个不是正确的复现方式，应该是代码中动态修改是失效的
@weizihahaha 应该是你引入的方式有问题。跟网络没关系，echarts 现在也没限制地图的使用（只是官网上不显示提供地图数据了）

@pissang I understand. However, This is a simulation of the issue. In my case I want to replace the whole data and the discrete animation looks odd. Is there a way to force the entry animation without recreating the whole series ?

Can a more permanent solution to this be found? Usually when you drag something on desktop, you are able to continue dragging even if your mouse isn't directly inside the track of the object you're moving. The user isn't aware that they're inside a canvas and need to only drag within that (to-them) arbitrary boundary. If you look at this video, it would be frustrating if my mouse cursor stopped moving every time I left the boundary of the window.

![drag-scroll](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/428873/63301301-39b57b80-c2a8-11e9-923d-053e17868e4f.gif)
@d4vsanchez @barts Thanks for the suggestion, we will change the code to listen to the document `mousemove`/`mouseout` events to improve the drag behavior
interval 作为回调函数，是在类目轴的时候决定每个类目是否显示，数值轴因为是连续的，所以没有这个场景

这个是为了防止大数据量渲染阻塞界面引入的渐进渲染效果。你可以设置 `progressive: 0`关闭渐进渲染，如果交互有卡顿的话，可以尝试设置 `large: true`

```
TypeError: Cannot set property 'x' of undefined
    at Sub.buildPath (LargeSymbolDraw.js:76)
